/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with bare trees, their branches reaching out into the clear blue sky. A red car is parked on the side of the road, adding a pop of color to the otherwise monochrome landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the trees and the road.
